name: Morning Glory Pancakes
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, combine muffin mix, egg, milk, and 2 tbsp oil. Let batter rest 3 min (it will continue to thicken). If batter is too thick, add water, 1 tbsp at a time, to adjust consistency. 
  2. Heat 1 tsp oil in Sauté Pan over medium heat.
  3. Working in batches and using 1⁄4 cup as a guide, scoop 3 pancakes into pan, leaving space between them.
  4. Cook 2–5 min. When bubbles appear on top of batter, flip each pancake and cook for additional 1–2 min.
  5. Repeat steps 2–4 for two more batches, or until all batter is cooked. Cooking times will vary.
  6. Serve with toppings, if desired.
tips: Make a large batch of pancakes and freeze them. Reheat in the toaster or microwave for a quick and hearty breakfast!
